Class GamePlayScreen

java.lang.Object
GamePlayScreen
public class GamePlayScreen extends Object
The GamePlayScreen class represents the gameplay screen for the VPets game. It handles the user interface, animations, timers for various stats decay, and interactions between the player and their pet.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePlayScreen

      public GamePlayScreen(Pet pet, JFrame frame, String name, Sound music, CardLayout cl, JPanel panelCont)
      Constructs a GamePlayScreen instance. Initializes the UI, loads resources (e.g., images, sounds), and sets up animations and timers.
      Parameters:
      pet - the current pet object
      frame - the main game frame
      name - the name of the pet
      music - background music for the gameplay
      cl - CardLayout for switching between screens
      panelCont - container for managing multiple panels

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • setUpButtonListeners

      public void setUpButtonListeners()
      Sets up button listeners for various pet actions, including feeding the pet. Handles interactions and updates based on the pet's state and available resources.

    • getGamePanel

      public JPanel getGamePanel()
      Returns the game panel for use in the application.
